{"blocks":[{"key":"8brj7","text":"Place the tube on a thermocycler and perform PCR amplification using the following PCR cycling conditions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3b1tb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b6nck","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7lksi","text":"* Please note the number of PCR cycles recommended in the following table are to be seen as s starting point to determine the number of PCR cycles best for your samples. The number of cycles should be chosen based on the input amount and sample type.
